title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, it still shows the old column names instead of the aliases set for the columns.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new data source and a dataset. 
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
